{"id":1199362945,"question_id":3351,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 days, 8 hours","timestamp":1710055103,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"229 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1199362945/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximize Happiness of Selected Children","memory":"108.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maximumHappinessSum(vector<int>& happiness, int k) {\n        using ll = long long;\n        sort(happiness.rbegin(), happiness.rend());\n        ll ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < k; i++){\n            ans += max(ll(0), ll(happiness[i] - i));\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximize-happiness-of-selected-children","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
